methods.name: canEnchant
javadoc: Determines if this enchantment can be applied to a specific ItemStack.

methods.name: checkCompatibility
javadoc: Determines if the enchantment passed can be applyied together with this enchantment.

methods.name: doPostAttack
javadoc: Called whenever a mob is damaged with an item that has this enchantment on it.

methods.name: getDamageBonus
javadoc: Calculates the additional damage that will be dealt by an item with this enchantment. This alternative to calcModifierDamage is sensitive to the targets EnumCreatureAttribute.

methods.name: getMaxLevel
javadoc: Returns the maximum level that the enchantment can have.

methods.name: getMinCost
javadoc: Returns the minimal value of enchantability needed on the enchantment level passed.
